title: Archer Dames
text:
Archer Dames is a South African <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> player who represented <a href="South%20Africa%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">South Africa</a> in the <a href="2000%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">2000 World Cup</a>.
He also played <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a>, representing the and in the <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> and representing the <a href="South%20Africa%20national%20rugby%20sevens%20team">South Africa national rugby sevens team</a> at the <a href="1999%20Paris%20Sevens">1999 Paris Sevens</a>.
